system-characteristics.system-name: Demonstration System representing an Application Owner
system-characteristics.description: This SSP demonstrates prototype modeling for sharing of responsibility.

information-types.title: System Assessment
information-types.description: This system handles development information pertaining to audit and assessment events to demonstrate the OSCAL workflow.

authorization-boundary.description: This system is for demonstration purposes only.

authorized-privileges.title: Developer
functions-performed: Manages the content and components within the system.

components.title: OSCAL Testing Workflow Application
components.description: This is an application to demonstrate minimal OSCAL content, and automation to execute tests against the application.
